General.Name: Anshan Hifichem Co Ltd
General.Description: Anshan Hifichem Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of high-performance organic pigments, solvent dyes, and intermediates in China. It serves a range of customers in the ink, coating, plastic, and other industries, as well as in electronic products, paper-coloring, and seed coloring industries. Anshan Hifichem Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Anshan, China.
General.Address: No. 8, 1st Bao An Road, Anshan, China, 114225
